com.metsci.glimpse.painter.plot

Class XYLinePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metsci.glimpse.painter.base.GlimpsePainterBase
      • com.metsci.glimpse.painter.plot.XYLinePainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlimpsePainter

    public class XYLinePainter
extends GlimpsePainterBase
    Plots a simple x-y lineplot. Provides options for modifying line thickness and color.
    Author:
    ulman
